text: Fleeting - After resolving, this card is removed from the game.
Visible - This card is visible to your opponent while in the story.
Sight X - The first X cards in the story are visible to you this round.
Inspire X - Next round you have X extra mana.
Nourish X - The next card you resolve is worth +X.
Starve X - The next card you resolve is worth -X.
Build X - If you have a robot in hand, give it +X. Otherwise create a 0:X Fleeting Robot in hand.
Tutor X - Draw a X-cost card. Priority for the card drawn is deck top to bottom, then discard pile top to bottom.
Flare - This card is worth 1 less point for every card before it in the story.
